protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the reversible transfer of the terminal phosphate group between ATP and AMP. May also be active with GTP (By similarity).

go_class.description: phosphotransferase activity, phosphate group as acceptor
nucleobase, nucleoside, nucleotide and nucleic acid metabolic process

reference.reference_text: Xu G, O'Connell P, Stevens J, White R: Characterization of human adenylate kinase 3 (AK3) cDNA and mapping of the AK3 pseudogene to an intron of the NF1 gene. Genomics. 1992 Jul;13(3):537-42.
